result.eng: We played a game of football.
result.html: d'imir muid cluiche peileWe played a game of football.
result.ponchtml: d'imir muid cluiċe peileWe played a game of football.

result.html: d'imir mé cispheil innéI played basketball yesterday.
result.ponchtml: d'imir mé cisṗeil innéI played basketball yesterday.

result.eng: It depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ga: tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.orig: tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.html: tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ponchtml: tá sé ag braṫ ar a ṁinice a ċastar na haṁráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
